channel.title: ai-literacy on Jonathan Loscalzo
channel.description: Recent content in ai-literacy on Jonathan Loscalzo

item.title: Diverse Topics of Machine Learning
item.description: I am going to gather diverse topics of ML, but I won’t discuss none of them. I gathered them because these are not technical topics per se, are more related to theory or part of the ecosystem. General: Machine Learning from Wikipedia AI transform playbook machine-learning-yearning tatistical inference in one sentence [data jujitsu][http://radar.oreilly.com/2012/07/data-jujitsu.html] Rules of ML - martin.zinkevich and summary here Problem Framing SE4ML AI Literacy What is AI Literacy?
